means: 发闪光，发微光( glimmer的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: I got some glimmering of what he was driving at.
sentence.Network_cn: 他这么说是什么意思,我有点明白了.

sentence.Network_en: Now that darkness was falling, only their silhouettes were outlined against the faintly glimmering sky.
sentence.Network_cn: 这时节两山只剩余一抹深黑, 赖天空微明为画出一个轮廓.

sentence.Network_en: He saw the glimmering of a fire upon the old walls, and entered.
sentence.Network_cn: 他看到炉火在古老的墙壁上闪闪发光, 走了进去.

PerfectNetExp.abs: glimmering 模糊的感觉(或认识) 43. beacon 灯塔,浮标 44. creek 小湾,小港,溪 45. current (水,空气等的)流,潮流;现时的,当前的 46. aback 猝不及防地.
now fades the glimmering landscape on the sight ., 视线中微光蒙蒙的风景正逐渐逝去.
A light is glimmering ., 一灯荧然.
there are no problems in the production of such a domestic robot to which we do not have already the glimmering of a solution .要生产这样的家用机器人存在着各种问题。然而这些问题的解决已略显端倪。

list.abs: gliding tectonics 滑动构造学glimmering lustre 微光泽global analysis 总分析
The sky was pink with the first glimmer of the dawn ., 天空因第一丝曙光而呈淡红色.
attend personally a glimmer of premier .亲临一线的总理。
The doctor ' s report gave us only a glimmer of hope ., 医生的报告给我们一丝希望.

despite online vilification and real-life harassment , he is trying to sue internet sites for defamation . victims of the internet mob still have a glimmer of hope .尽管网络上的诬陷与现实中的骚扰不断，该男子仍想尽办法起诉相关网站的诽谤行为，看来这些网络暴徒的受害者们仍有着一丝的希望。

entry.tran: 微弱的迹象；蒙眬的显现
entry.def: A glimmering of something is a faint sign of it.

means.word_mean: 1. a slight suggestion or vague understanding;

sentences.sentence: "he had no inkling what was about to happen"
"the glimmering mist of a spring rain splashed by sun and streaked by rainbow"- Claudia Cassidy
